price: Yawe haya ni kifumbua macho na ukumbusho kwa kila mja mwenye kuelekea.
footnotes: Tumejaalia hayo aone na akumbuke kila mja mwenye kurejea kwa Mola wake Mlezi, akafikiri Ishara za uwezo wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
